wiki.content:
One of Jimmy Cliffs biggest hits. Has Been coverd by Northern Irish punk band Stiff Little Fingers and fellow Jamaicans Desmond Dekker and the Aces.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: One of Jimmy Cliffs biggest hits. Has Been coverd by Northern Irish punk band Stiff Little Fingers and fellow Jamaicans Desmond Dekker and the Aces.

track.name: You Can Get It If You Really Want
comments: You can get it if you really want, but you must try, try, and try

@balefireone: A year later from your post, and it was the first song of my day at 6AM, you're right :)

"Ahh, great song to start the day off =) "
good vibes in song for sure ~ so very uplifting
Yes!U will succeed at last, despite the tribulations!

"Ahh, great song to start the day off =)" Yep, ain't that the truth. I would also like to submit that this is great music to get your AK all greased up to on the ride to making the bank heist. Loot'n & Shoot'n is always better with a upbeat tempo!
This is actually a Desmond Dekker song, not Jimmy Cliff.  Dont know why it keeps coming up on here and iTunes as such...
One of the Best Voices in all of Jamaica
Ahh, great song to start the day off =)
Saw them live this summer.    the dude still has tons of energy
